LanguageData.RH_TET_Daemons_AncientShrineWarning: As {PAWN_nameDef} draws near the strange wall, a sense of uncanny foreboding overcomes {PAWN_objective}. {PAWN_pronoun} isn't sure why, but {PAWN_pronoun} feels that this dusty structure may contain great danger.
LanguageData.RH_TET_Daemons_MovingOn: The nearby daemons apparently have a different target in mind.
LanguageData.RH_TET_Daemons_MessageDaemonsSpawned: Daemons have spewed from the portal.
